name: pve-apidoc-converter
description: Download the Proxmox PVE API documentation (apidoc.js) from https://pve.proxmox.com/pve-docs/api-viewer/ and transform it so that the file can be imported in node
author: David HEURTEVENT (https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-heurtevent/)

scriptsComments.download: Download the API spec (apidoc.js) from https://pve.proxmox.com/pve-docs/api-viewer/. Saved as ./output/proxmoxsrc/apidoc.js
scriptsComments.modifyapidoc: Read the apidoc.js file, modify it so that it can be imported in node.js using require. Saved as ./output/modified/apidocmod.js
scriptsComments.build: Download the API spec from Proxmox and make the file ready to be used in node.js
scriptsComments.generatereport: Generate an analysis of the API documentation
